events.message: I was involved in a car accident yesterday. My vehicle was severely damaged in the collision and I need to file a claim as soon as possible.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and accident details provided by the customer.
An agent specializing in vehicle claims has been assigned to handle the customer's case and assist through the process.
The customer has received confirmation that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is now under review.
We have requested all relevant documents including police report, vehicle photos, and repair estimates to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all required documents promptly, including photos of the damaged vehicle and the official police accident report.
Our investigation team has started reviewing the submitted documentation and assessing the circumstances of the vehicle collision.
The investigation has been completed, confirming that the accident was not the fault of the customer and the damages are covered.
A settlement proposal has been sent to the customer including full repair costs coverage and a rental vehicle reimbursement.
The customer responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciation for the prompt handling.
After reviewing the customer acceptance, the claim has been formally approved for payment issuance to cover all damages.
The payment covering vehicle repairs and associated expenses has been issued to the customer's preferred bank account.
The claim has been successfully closed following the settlement and payment, with no further action required from the customer.
